title: 7.2 Master Challenge 2
question: Forecast the time series obtained from sts-data.csv data using the SARIMA model with p=0, d=0, q=0, P=1, D=1, Q=1, and m=16 parameters. Plot the original, test, and forecasted time series on the same graph.
